description.value: Metal manacles used to restrain a Small or Medium creature.  A creature must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity save to escape the manacles, or they can be broken with a DC 20 Strength check.  Each set of manacles comes with a single key, and without it a creature proficient with Thieves’ Tools can pick the manacles’ lock with a successful DC 15 Dexterity check.  Manacles have 15 Hit Points.
